body_html:
This apparently happens because openmpi is pulled in by some dependency, but not linked into the main module .so.
What I did was to resolve this was to add openmpi to main_libraries around here:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/setup.py#L424

I'm not sure what the correct way is to infer which library is needed, though.

Best regards

Thomas

body:
This apparently happens because openmpi is pulled in by some dependency, but not linked into the main module .so.
What I did was to resolve this was to add openmpi to main_libraries around here:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/setup.py#L424

I'm not sure what the correct way is to infer which library is needed, though.
